channel.title: Wilderness riot!
channel.description:
THE WILDERNESS RIOT The riot begins on june 2nd 2008 world 2 and 1 and any other worlds you want if you really want the wilderness back you will do it to do it you will need to use a auto talker or spammer it would help if someone sent a link
location of riot:varrok wilderness,edgevill wilderness how long:hole day
[s]help:please advertise this on different website forums.here is my forum if you need any info on how the riot is doing -REMOVED- remember to register n post bout riot[/s]
IF THIS WORKS AND WE GET OUR WILDERNESS BACK CAN YOU SAY IT WAS ME THAT STARTED THE RIOT i am sorry if this is wrong section but i am asumming it is right beacuse it said (general discussion) so i can discuss wat i want here unless you dont .like me or dont want me to.
THIS IS THE PART WHEN YOU COME IN:: [s]You alredy have the link for my forum[/s] i will need over 2000 people probaly to advertise. and also advertise on runescape(but that is very risky)
[please post on my forums or this thread if you are going to advertise]
thanks every one i really hope this works i do not go on moparscape forums alot so post on my forums if you think this is really going to help [s]give me rep+[/s]

item.title: Wilderness riot!
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

Shitty spelling, advertising, asking for rep.

I’ve edited your post and ruled out the bullshit, however this still deserves a lock.

Read full topic

item.title: Wilderness riot!
item.dc:creator: @HeWhoOpensADoor HeWhoOpensADoor
item.description:
@HeWhoOpensADoor wrote:

This will not work, Jagex will not reverse an update like this just because some snotty nosed brats don’t like the fact that now they can’t “pwn nubs n taek der itumz”…Jagex did what they had to do to protect their game from the Asian fuckheads that where goldfarming in it and selling it for RL cash.

Read full topic
